Mint Life Sciences Pvt. Ltd. excels in the manufacturing and distribution of a diverse array of API, pharmaceutical and healthcare products. Our commitment to quality is underscored by our ISO 9001:2015 Certification, and our advanced manufacturing facilities are fully compliant with WHO-GMP standards. Within our extensive product portfolio, we offer a range of critical healthcare solutions. This includes Injectable formulations, Tablets, Capsules, Soft Gelatin Capsules, Oral Liquid preparations such as Syrups and Suspensions, as well as Oral Dry Syrups. \n\n Our offerings extend to External Liquids, Ointments, Creams, Beta lactum Products, General Pharmaceuticals, Nutraceuticals, and even specialized products like Soaps, Shampoo, Eye Drops, Ear Drops, and Oral Sachets and powders. Moreover, we proudly manufacture External Powders, Cosmetics, and hospital grade disinfectants, reflecting our commitment to providing comprehensive healthcare solutions for both humans and animals. With a dedication to excellence and a focus on research-driven, high-quality production, we stand as a trusted partner in the pharmaceutical industry, dedicated to improving health and well-being on a global scale. Our relentless pursuit of innovation and adherence to strict quality standards sets us apart as a leader in the pharmaceutical industry, ensuring that our products consistently meet the highest levels of efficacy and safety.
